abs.view

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • abs.view.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that prints the menu screens, accepts and validates inputs then returns results.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Menu(java.util.Scanner sc, Utilities utils, UserAuth userAuth)
      For default scanner see other constructor.
      Menu(Utilities utils, UserAuth userAuth)
      This constructor used the default scanner.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBooking()
      Prints the add booking menu and options.
      int bookingOptions()
      Print the available bookings and Booking options.
      int businessInfo()
      Prints the Business info for the active business.
      void businessSelect()
      Prints the business selection screen.
      void cancelBooking()
      Prints the cancel booking menu.
      int customerDashboard()
      Prints the customer dashboard for the active user and the active business.
      Business getActiveBusiness()
      Gets the active business.
      User loginMenu()
      Prints the login screen.
      int mainMenu()
      Prints the main menu prompting for login or register.
      int myBookings()
      Prints the customers booking and options.
      int ownerDashboard()
      Prints the Owner dashboard and options.
      User registerMenu()
      Prints the registration screen.

      • Menu

        public Menu(Utilities utils,
            UserAuth userAuth)
        This constructor used the default scanner.
        Parameters:
        utils - A utilities object that loads/stores the data
        userAuth - a UserAuth object that verifies and stores active user info.
        See Also:
        Menu(Scanner, Utilities, UserAuth)

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.util.Scanner sc,
            Utilities utils,
            UserAuth userAuth)
        For default scanner see other constructor.
        Parameters:
        sc - a specified scanner, used for testing
        utils - A utilities object that loads/stores the data
        userAuth - a UserAuth object that verifies and stores active user info.
        See Also:
        Menu(Utilities, UserAuth)

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveBusiness

        public Business getActiveBusiness()
        Gets the active business.
        Returns:
        the business selected by the user

      • mainMenu

        public int mainMenu()
        Prints the main menu prompting for login or register.
        Returns:
        the int value of the users selection.

      • loginMenu

        public User loginMenu()
        Prints the login screen. Accepts credentials and attempts to log the user in.
        Returns:
        the logged in user, else null

      • registerMenu

        public User registerMenu()
        Prints the registration screen. Accepts user registration info and attempts to register an log that user in.
        Returns:
        the newly registered and logged in user, else null

      • businessSelect

        public void businessSelect()
        Prints the business selection screen. Upon a valid selection the active business is set as the selection.

      • customerDashboard

        public int customerDashboard()
        Prints the customer dashboard for the active user and the active business.
        Returns:
        the int value of the users selection.

      • businessInfo

        public int businessInfo()
        Prints the Business info for the active business.
        Returns:
        the int value of the selection, 1 back, 2 exit

      • bookingOptions

        public int bookingOptions()
        Print the available bookings and Booking options.
        Returns:
        the int value of the users selection.

      • myBookings

        public int myBookings()
        Prints the customers booking and options.
        Returns:
        the int value of the users selection

      • cancelBooking

        public void cancelBooking()
        Prints the cancel booking menu.

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking()
        Prints the add booking menu and options.

      • ownerDashboard

        public int ownerDashboard()
        Prints the Owner dashboard and options.
        Returns:
        the int value of the users selection.
